verses.verse: And <S%H5070>Nadab<s%> and <S%H30>Abihu,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H376>either<s%> of them his <S%H4289>censer,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H2004>therein,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H5921>thereon,<s%> and <S%H7126>offered<s%> <S%H2114>strange<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them not.
And there <S%H3318>went<s%> out <S%H784>fire<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H398>devoured<s%> them, and they <S%H4191>died<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H1931>This<s%> is it that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> I will be <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> in them that <S%H7138>come<s%> <S%H7138>near<s%> me, and <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> I will be <S%H3513>glorified.<s%> And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H1826>held<s%> his <S%H1826>peace.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H4332>Mishael<s%> and <S%H469>Elzaphan,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5816>Uzziel<s%> the <S%H1730>uncle<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H7126>Come<s%> <S%H7126>near,<s%> <S%H5375>carry<s%> your <S%H251>brothers<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> out of the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>
So they <S%H7126>went<s%> <S%H7126>near,<s%> and <S%H5375>carried<s%> them in their <S%H3801>coats<s%> out of the <S%H4264>camp;<s%> as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H1696>said.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and to <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> and to <S%H385>Ithamar,<s%> his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H6544>Uncover<s%> not your <S%H7218>heads,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H6533>rend<s%> your <S%H899>clothes;<s%> <S%H3808>lest<s%> you <S%H4191>die,<s%> and lest <S%H7107>wrath<s%> come on <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>people:<s%> but let your <S%H251>brothers,<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H1058>mourn<s%> the <S%H8316>burning<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H8313>kindled.<s%>

And you shall not <S%H3318>go<s%> out from the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> you <S%H4191>die:<s%> for the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is on you. And they <S%H6213>did<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Do not <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> nor strong <S%H7941>drink,<s%> you, nor your <S%H1121>sons<s%> with you, when you <S%H935>go<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> <S%H3808>lest<s%> you <S%H4191>die:<s%> it shall be a <S%H2708>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations:<s%>
And that you may put <S%H914>difference<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> and <S%H2455>unholy,<s%> and <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H2931>unclean<s%> and <S%H2889>clean;<s%>

And that you may <S%H3384>teach<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to them by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and to <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> and to <S%H385>Ithamar,<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> that were <S%H3498>left,<s%> <S%H3947>Take<s%> the meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> that <S%H3498>remains<s%> of the offerings of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> made by fire, and <S%H398>eat<s%> it <S%H4682>without<s%> <S%H4682>leaven<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H4196>altar:<s%> for it is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy:<s%>

And you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it in the <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> it is your <S%H2706>due,<s%> and your <S%H1121>sons'<s%> <S%H2706>due,<s%> of the sacrifices of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> made by fire: for <S%H3651>so<s%> I am <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>

And the <S%H8573>wave<s%> <S%H2373>breast<s%> and <S%H8641>heave<s%> <S%H7785>shoulder<s%> shall you <S%H398>eat<s%> in a <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H4725>place;<s%> you, and your <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> with you: for they be your <S%H2706>due,<s%> and your <S%H1121>sons'<s%> <S%H2706>due,<s%> which are <S%H5414>given<s%> out of the <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of <S%H8002>peace<s%> offerings of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

The <S%H8641>heave<s%> <S%H7785>shoulder<s%> and the <S%H8573>wave<s%> <S%H2373>breast<s%> shall they <S%H935>bring<s%> with the offerings made by fire of the <S%H2459>fat,<s%> to <S%H5130>wave<s%> it for a <S%H8573>wave<s%> offering <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and it shall be yours, and your <S%H1121>sons'<s%> with you, by a <S%H2706>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever;<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> diligently <S%H1875>sought<s%> the <S%H8163>goat<s%> of the <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering, and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it was <S%H8313>burnt:<s%> and he was <S%H7107>angry<s%> with <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> and <S%H385>Ithamar,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> which were <S%H3498>left<s%> alive, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H4069>Why<s%> have you not <S%H398>eaten<s%> the <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> <S%H3588>seeing<s%> it is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy,<s%> and God has <S%H5414>given<s%> it you to <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> to make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for them <S%H6440>before<s%> the LORD?

<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of it was not <S%H935>brought<s%> in <S%H6441>within<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place: you should indeed have <S%H398>eaten<s%> it in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place, as I <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> have they <S%H7126>offered<s%> their <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering and their <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and <S%H428>such<s%> things have <S%H7122>befallen<s%> me: and if I had <S%H398>eaten<s%> the <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering to <S%H3117>day,<s%> should it have been <S%H3190>accepted<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD?<s%>
And when <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that, he was <S%H3190>content.<s%>
